items.name: Wajir Toonland Adventures
items.short_description: A vibrant space where children can meet beloved cartoon characters, get autographs, and enjoy interactive shows. Features local storytelling alongside global favorites.
items.address: Community Hall, Biashara Street, Wajir Town

items.name: Safari Squad Meet-Up
items.short_description: Join the 'Safari Squad' for exciting photo opportunities and engaging storytelling sessions with animal-themed cartoon characters promoting wildlife awareness.
items.address: Wajir Primary School Grounds, Bute Road, Wajir

items.name: Desert Dream Characters
items.short_description: Meet friendly, desert-inspired cartoon characters who share tales of the Wajir landscape and local traditions. Perfect for cultural immersion.
items.address: Wajir Cultural Center, Garissa Road, Wajir

items.name: Heroes & Heroines Pavilion
items.short_description: A special area dedicated to children meeting and interacting with characters representing bravery, kindness, and community spirit.
items.address: Wajir Township Park, Adjacent to Governor's Office

items.name: Wajir Brick Builders Hub
items.short_description: An indoor park filled with thousands of Lego bricks, allowing children to build anything from desert vehicles to local homesteads. Workshops available.
items.address: Old Airport Road, Near Wajir Airstrip

items.name: Desert Design Lab
items.short_description: Kids can design and construct miniature Wajir towns, bridges, and infrastructure using large building blocks and Lego sets. Focus on urban planning.
items.address: Makaburi Street, Wajir North

items.name: Future Architects Zone
items.short_description: An interactive construction park featuring various building materials, including giant foam blocks and Lego Duplo, to inspire future architects and engineers.
items.address: Along Wajir-Mandera Road, Kismayu Ward

items.name: Wajir Wonders Workshop
items.short_description: A creative space where children can experiment with different building challenges, from constructing the tallest tower to designing a functional vehicle with Lego.
items.address: Market Street, Central Wajir

items.name: Wajir Funfair Carnival
items.short_description: A collection of classic family-friendly amusement rides, including a mini Ferris wheel, carousel, and bumper cars, providing joy for all ages.
items.address: Wajir Showground, Near Wajir Referral Hospital

items.name: Desert Explorer Train
items.short_description: A gentle miniature train ride that takes children on a scenic journey through a simulated desert landscape, complete with animal cutouts.
items.address: Wajir Riverside Park, Along Tana River (seasonal)

items.name: Soaring Eagle Swings
items.short_description: Experience the joy of flight on the soaring eagle swing ride, a classic attraction that lifts riders high into the air for exhilarating views.
items.address: Wajir Public Gardens, Opposite District Commissioner's Office

items.name: Junior Jeep Adventure
items.short_description: Kids can drive their own mini-jeeps on a specially designed track, simulating a safari adventure with safe, low-speed fun.
items.address: Old Airfield Road, Near Wajir Primary School

items.name: Wajir Oasis Water Wonders
items.short_description: A small but informative aquarium showcasing indigenous freshwater fish species found in seasonal rivers and boreholes, promoting water conservation.
items.address: Wajir Environmental Centre, Off Wajir-Garissa Road

items.name: Desert Depths Discovery
items.short_description: A unique 'virtual' aquarium experience combined with real small-scale exhibits, allowing children to explore simulated ocean environments and learn about marine life.
items.address: Wajir Innovation Hub, Next to Post Office

items.name: Wajir Pond Life Pavilion
items.short_description: Dedicated to the fascinating microscopic and small aquatic life found in local water sources, including insects, amphibians, and tiny fish. Interactive exhibits.
items.address: Wajir Botanical Gardens, Behind County Assembly

items.name: River Journey Exhibit
items.short_description: Follow the simulated journey of a river from its source to the sea, highlighting different aquatic ecosystems and the creatures that inhabit them, with focus on conservation.
items.address: Wajir Youth Resource Center, Airport Road

items.name: Wajir Whispers & Wonders Garden
items.short_description: A serene park with themed zones where local elders and storytellers share traditional Somali and Kenyan tales under shady trees.
items.address: Wajir Public Library Grounds, Opposite District Hospital

items.name: Legends of the North-East
items.short_description: An interactive park where children can walk through scenes from popular local legends, with costumed characters bringing stories to life.
items.address: Wajir Cultural Heritage Site, Along Bute Road

items.name: The Talking Trees Trail
items.short_description: Follow a winding path through a garden where hidden speakers and artistic installations recount fables and animal stories, encouraging imaginative play.
items.address: Wajir Green Belt Project, Along Wajir-Mandera Highway

items.name: Dream Weaver's Pavilion
items.short_description: A cozy, open-air pavilion designed for storytelling, puppetry, and creative writing workshops, where children can also share their own stories.
items.address: Wajir Children's Centre, Madarasah Street

items.name: Wajir Junior Sports Complex
items.short_description: A multi-purpose mini-arena offering football, basketball, and volleyball courts sized for children, promoting active play and friendly competition.
items.address: Adjacent to Wajir Stadium, Kismayu Ward

items.name: Little Champions Track & Field
items.short_description: A scaled-down track and field area for children to practice running, jumping, and throwing, encouraging basic athletic skills.
items.address: Wajir Public Sports Grounds, Bute Road

items.name: Wajir Net Sports Hub
items.short_description: Featuring mini-courts for badminton, tennis, and table tennis, ideal for children to develop hand-eye coordination and learn new sports.
items.address: Wajir Social Hall, Opposite County Headquarters

items.name: Desert Dash Obstacle Course
items.short_description: A fun, safe obstacle course designed for children to climb, crawl, and balance, promoting physical agility and problem-solving.
items.address: Wajir Adventure Park, Near Wajir Airstrip

items.name: Wajir Oasis Adventure Park
items.short_description: A sprawling outdoor park with swings, slides, climbing frames, and a zipline, all set in a beautifully landscaped, shaded environment.
items.address: Wajir Public Gardens, Adjacent to Wajir Town Council

items.name: Sandy Explorers Playground
items.short_description: A unique sand-based playground featuring large sandpits, digging equipment, and structures for creative sand play, perfect for younger children.
items.address: Along Wajir Riverbank (seasonal), Behind Wajir Main Market

items.name: Sky High Climbing Towers
items.short_description: A challenging adventure park with multi-level climbing towers, rope bridges, and obstacle courses for older children to test their agility and courage.
items.address: Wajir Youth Park, Wajir Garissa Road

items.name: The Nesting Village Play Area
items.short_description: Inspired by local bird nests and traditional shelters, this playground offers unique structures for imaginative play, hiding, and exploring.
items.address: Wajir Township Gardens, Block A

items.name: Wajir Dino Discovery Land
items.short_description: Step back in time to an era of giants! This park features life-sized dinosaur models, interactive displays, and fossil digging pits for young paleontologists.
items.address: Wajir Science & Dino Park, Along Bute Road

items.name: Jurassic Journey Wajir
items.short_description: Embark on a thrilling journey through animated dinosaur exhibits, complete with sound effects and educational signboards. Learn about different species.
items.address: Wajir Family Entertainment Complex, Old Airport Road

items.name: Dino Dig Site & Lab
items.short_description: An educational attraction where children can participate in mock archaeological digs, uncovering dinosaur bones, and then assemble skeletons in a fun 'lab' setting.
items.address: Wajir Museum Annex, Adjacent to County Assembly

items.name: Wajir Reptile Realm
items.short_description: While not strictly dinosaurs, this park explores ancient reptiles and their modern descendants, featuring large models and information about evolution.
items.address: Wajir Conservation Centre, Wajir South

items.name: Wajir Kids' Farm & Petting Zoo
items.short_description: An interactive farm where children can meet and feed friendly farm animals like goats, sheep, and camels, learning about their care and local pastoral life.
items.address: Wajir Agricultural Show Grounds, Garissa Road

items.name: The Little Farmer's Garden
items.short_description: Children can learn about planting, growing vegetables, and sustainable farming practices in a hands-on garden, including collecting fresh produce.
items.address: Wajir Green Farm Project, Along Wajir-Moyale Road

items.name: Wajir Camel & Livestock Experience
items.short_description: A unique opportunity for children to interact with camels, learn about their importance in the region, and even experience a short camel ride.
items.address: Wajir Livestock Training Centre, Diiso Location

items.name: Dairy Discoveries Milk Station
items.short_description: Children learn where milk comes from, how it's processed, and can even try their hand at 'milking' a simulated cow, focusing on local dairy practices.
items.address: Wajir Food & Nutrition Centre, Near Township Market

items.name: Wajir Junior Explorers Museum
items.short_description: An interactive museum designed for children to explore local culture, science, and history through hands-on exhibits and creative play zones.
items.address: Wajir Cultural Centre Extension, Off Biashara Street

items.name: Desert Discoveries Science Lab
items.short_description: A children's museum wing focused on science experiments, geology, and understanding the unique ecosystem of Wajir through fun, practical activities.
items.address: Wajir Education Hub, Airport Road

items.name: Wajir Arts & Craft Corner
items.short_description: An expressive space within the museum where children can engage in traditional Wajir crafts, painting, and artistic expression, guided by local artisans.
items.address: Wajir Community Arts Centre, Near Main Mosque

items.name: Our Wajir Heritage House
items.short_description: A children-friendly museum showcasing the rich history, traditions, and artifacts of Wajir, with engaging displays and stories about the region's past.
items.address: Wajir County Museum, Along Wajir-Garissa Road
